data.title: The Top Artists Who Debuted in 1976
meta_keywords: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame
data.meta_description: Which artists had their debut recording in ?
data.text:
⇦ 1975 1977 ⇨

Top 15 Artists Who Released their Debut Recording in 1976

These artists released their first recording in 1976, which made them first eligible for the 2002 Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony. Artists aleady inducted in the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame are highlighted in orange.

1. Talking Heads2. Tom Petty & the Heartbreakers3. Ramones4. Blondie5. Sex Pistols6. John Mellencamp7. The Modern Lovers8. Heart9. Boston10. The Damned11. Luther Vandross12. Peter Tosh13. The Runaways14. Nick Lowe15. Kenny Loggins
